lines.text: You are a dyed-in-the-wool, fascist, reactionary, squalid little, 'know your place', 'don't rise above yourself', 'don't get out of your hole' - complacent little turd.
You are morally, spiritually and physically a festering fly-blown heap of accumulated filth.

[trying to convince Albert to change the channel of the partitioned TV set]
We had an agreement, we shook hands. I have got the law of contract on my side.
I have the knobs on my side.

[Albert has placed 'bum' on the Scrabble board]
My "bum" is the American word for 'tramp'.
Well, that is where I've got you because you can't use any slang or colloquialisms!
Right then, I'll stick to me English "bum". And that's the part of your anatomy that swells out of the back of your trousers.

[looking at old newspapers]
'Ere, I remember this - Mussolini invades Albania - King Zog flees.
That's nothing mate, we got King Size fleas here!
